// JSHIR-NEXT:     "jsir.variable_declaration"() <{kind = "var"}> ({

// JSHIR-NEXT:       %2 = "jsir.identifier_ref"() <{name = "a"}> : () -> !jsir.any
// JSHIR-NEXT:       %3 = "jsir.numeric_literal"() <{extra = #jsir<numeric_literal_extra "1", 1.000000e+00 : f64>, value = 1.000000e+00 : f64}> : () -> !jsir.any
// JSHIR-NEXT:       %4 = "jsir.assignment_expression"(%2, %3) <{operator_ = "="}> : (!jsir.any, !jsir.any) -> !jsir.any

// JSHIR-NEXT: }) : () -> ()
